original_title: กรรไกร ไข่ ผ้าไหม
overview: A new school is found to prepare the students for the new economic community in Southeast asia.  The school recruit bright students in academic, sports, music and dancing.  However, there is more to lives in school than studies and extra curricular activities, when love blossoms in the hearts of these young students, everything will never be the same in this school.
title: My Best Years
